languages.text: "Я дам тебе шанс, Ирлиэт. Встань рядом со мной — или погибнешь".

traits.locale_text: "Я дам тебе шанс, Ирлиэт. Встань рядом со мной — или погибнешь".

languages.text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
languages.original_text: "Я дам тебе шанс, Ирлиэт. Встань рядом со мной — или погибнешь".

traits.locale_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
"I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
"I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
"I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
"I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."
"I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

languages.text: «Voy a darte una oportunidad, Yrliet. Quédate a mi lado o perecerás».
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: «Voy a darte una oportunidad, Yrliet. Quédate a mi lado o perecerás».

languages.text: “我给你个机会，伊莉耶特。站在我这边，否则就去死吧。”
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: “我给你个机会，伊莉耶特。站在我这边，否则就去死吧。”

languages.text: « Je vais vous donner une chance, Yrliet. Restez à mes côtés... ou mourez. »
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: « Je vais vous donner une chance, Yrliet. Restez à mes côtés... ou mourez. »

languages.text: 「チャンスをやろう、ユリエット。私の側に立つか…それとも滅びるか」
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: 「チャンスをやろう、ユリエット。私の側に立つか…それとも滅びるか」

languages.text: "Ich gebe Euch eine Chance, Yrliet. Steht an meiner Seite — oder sterbt."
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gebe Euch eine Chance, Yrliet. Steht an meiner Seite — oder sterbt."

languages.text: "Sana tek bir şans veriyorum Yrliet. Ya yanımda durursun ya canından olursun."
languages.original_text: "I will give you a chance, Yrliet. Stand by my side — or perish."

traits.locale_text: "Sana tek bir şans veriyorum Yrliet. Ya yanımda durursun ya canından olursun."
